alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Chilton; Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Autauga, southeastern Chilton and northeastern Dallas Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Verbena to near Potter Station. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Prattville, Selma, Millbrook, Clanton, Valley Grande, Selmont-West Selmont, Deatsville, Autaugaville, Billingsley, Booth, Vida Junction, Gardner Island, Parnell, Tyler, Autauga County Airport, Dallas County Horse Arena, Verbena, Plecher, Mulberry and Marbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
